Clean Task

The clean task is capable of stripping any WSIT specific configuration from a WSDL or WSIT configuration file.

AttributeDescriptionRequired
fileThe file to strip WSIT configuration from. Must be a wsit configuration file (starts with the wsdl document element).yes
todirThe configuration files will be written to this directory. Either this or tofile must be specified.yes – unless tofile is specified
tofileThe configuration files will be written to this file. Either this or todir must be specified.yes – unless todir is specified

Example:

<wsit-clean file="MyService.wsdl" todir="generated" />

In this example the MyService.wsdl file would be stripped of all WSIT configuration and saved to the generated folder.
